entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
